subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jim Thome’s 500th home run was a game-winner. He hit a two-run shot in the bottom of the ninth inning yesterday to give the Chicago White Sox a 9-7 victory against the Los Angeles Angels, becoming the 23rd player — and third this season — to reach 500 home runs.
